summary: The ego vehicle approaches an intersection with limited visibility due to parked trucks and containers. A pedestrian suddenly appears from behind a truck on the left side of the road.
actions: Ego vehicle is moving forward. Several trucks are parked along the side of the road. A pedestrian begins to cross the street.
key_objects: Ego vehicle, trucks, pedestrian, intersection, containers
next_action: Ego vehicle will likely need to brake to avoid the pedestrian.
